entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 70 percent chance of flurries later in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
